net.frozencode.jniolib.server

Class JNioChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.frozencode.jniolib.server.JNioChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.nio.channels.ByteChannel, java.nio.channels.Channel, java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel, java.nio.channels.WritableByteChannel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JNioTCPChannel

    public abstract class JNioChannel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.nio.channels.ByteChannel
    The JNioChannel class stores data about and provides methods to communicate with a client. Subclasses of this class must be thread-safe.

    • Method Detail

      • attach

        public final void attach(java.lang.Object obj)
        Attaches a specified Object to this JNioChannel. The attached Object will be returned by the attachment() method until this method is called with a different object.
        Parameters:
        obj - the Object to attach. NULL-OK.

      • attachment

        public final java.lang.Object attachment()
        Returns the Object last passed to the attach() method, or NULL if the attach() method has never been called.
        Returns:
        the Object last passed to the attach() method, or NULL if the attach() method has never been called.
